name: Hit The Slopes
description:
Lets Hit The Slopes.....
Grab your ski's or snow board and plough down the mountain.
But first you must complete a training session before you can hit the top slopes.
Complete an around the flag challenge, then we will be off to the top slopes.
Watch out for kids on there toboggans and snow mobiles,
Avoid trees, rocks and fences and zig zag down.
Keep an eye out for snow conditions, as some parts a deep and slow you down and other parts are icy and speed you up.
Collect some cash as you go, and use to unlock new characters.
Simple one touch game play.
Leader Boards to challenge friends and the world.
Share with your friends and challenge them on the slopes.
